CancelJournalKinesisStream.name: CancelJournalKinesisStream
CancelJournalKinesisStream.description: Grants permission to cancel a journal kinesis stream

CreateLedger.name: CreateLedger
CreateLedger.description: Grants permission to create a ledger

DeleteLedger.name: DeleteLedger
DeleteLedger.description: Grants permission to delete a ledger

DescribeJournalKinesisStream.name: DescribeJournalKinesisStream
DescribeJournalKinesisStream.description: Grants permission to describe information about a journal kinesis stream

DescribeJournalS3Export.name: DescribeJournalS3Export
DescribeJournalS3Export.description: Grants permission to describe information about a journal export job

DescribeLedger.name: DescribeLedger
DescribeLedger.description: Grants permission to describe a ledger

ExecuteStatement.name: ExecuteStatement
ExecuteStatement.description: Grants permission to send commands to a ledger via the console

ExportJournalToS3.name: ExportJournalToS3
ExportJournalToS3.description: Grants permission to export journal contents to an Amazon S3 bucket

GetBlock.name: GetBlock
GetBlock.description: Grants permission to retrieve a block from a ledger for a given BlockAddress

GetDigest.name: GetDigest
GetDigest.description: Grants permission to retrieve a digest from a ledger for a given BlockAddress

GetRevision.name: GetRevision
GetRevision.description: Grants permission to retrieve a revision for a given document ID and a given BlockAddress

InsertSampleData.name: InsertSampleData
InsertSampleData.description: Grants permission to insert sample application data via the console

ListJournalKinesisStreamsForLedger.name: ListJournalKinesisStreamsForLedger
ListJournalKinesisStreamsForLedger.description: Grants permission to list journal kinesis streams for a specified ledger

ListJournalS3Exports.name: ListJournalS3Exports
ListJournalS3Exports.description: Grants permission to list journal export jobs for all ledgers

ListJournalS3ExportsForLedger.name: ListJournalS3ExportsForLedger
ListJournalS3ExportsForLedger.description: Grants permission to list journal export jobs for a specified ledger

ListLedgers.name: ListLedgers
ListLedgers.description: Grants permission to list existing ledgers

ListTagsForResource.name: ListTagsForResource
ListTagsForResource.description: Grants permission to list tags for a resource

PartiQLCreateIndex.name: PartiQLCreateIndex
PartiQLCreateIndex.description: Grants permission to create an index on a table

PartiQLCreateTable.name: PartiQLCreateTable
PartiQLCreateTable.description: Grants permission to create a table

PartiQLDelete.name: PartiQLDelete
PartiQLDelete.description: Grants permission to delete documents from a table

PartiQLDropIndex.name: PartiQLDropIndex
PartiQLDropIndex.description: Grants permission to drop an index from a table

PartiQLDropTable.name: PartiQLDropTable
PartiQLDropTable.description: Grants permission to drop a table

PartiQLHistoryFunction.name: PartiQLHistoryFunction
PartiQLHistoryFunction.description: Grants permission to use the history function on a table

PartiQLInsert.name: PartiQLInsert
PartiQLInsert.description: Grants permission to insert documents into a table

PartiQLSelect.name: PartiQLSelect
PartiQLSelect.description: Grants permission to select documents from a table

PartiQLUndropTable.name: PartiQLUndropTable
PartiQLUndropTable.description: Grants permission to undrop a table

PartiQLUpdate.name: PartiQLUpdate
PartiQLUpdate.description: Grants permission to update existing documents in a table

SendCommand.name: SendCommand
SendCommand.description: Grants permission to send commands to a ledger

ShowCatalog.name: ShowCatalog
ShowCatalog.description: Grants permission to view a ledger's catalog via the console

StreamJournalToKinesis.name: StreamJournalToKinesis
StreamJournalToKinesis.description: Grants permission to stream journal contents to a Kinesis Data Stream

TagResource.name: TagResource
TagResource.description: Grants permission to add one or more tags to a resource

UntagResource.name: UntagResource
UntagResource.description: Grants permission to remove one or more tags from a resource

UpdateLedger.name: UpdateLedger
UpdateLedger.description: Grants permission to update properties on a ledger

UpdateLedgerPermissionsMode.name: UpdateLedgerPermissionsMode
UpdateLedgerPermissionsMode.description: Grants permission to update the permissions mode on a ledger
